description: A tool for creating a binary mask given a FITS image

parameters.info: Restored image file from which to build mask
parameters.name: restored-image

parameters.info: Input mask file(s). Either --restored-image or --mask-image must be specfied
parameters.name: mask-image

parameters.info: Box size over which to compute stats (default = 50)
parameters.name: boxsize

parameters.info: Merge in one or more masks or region files
parameters.name: merge

parameters.info: Subtract one or more masks or region files
parameters.name: subtract

parameters.info: Number the islands detected (default=do not number islands)
parameters.name: number-islands

parameters.info: List of islands to remove from input mask. e.g. --remove-islands 1 18 20 20h10m13s,14d15m20s
parameters.name: remove-islands

parameters.info: List of islands to extract remove from input mask. e.g. --extract-islands 1 18 20 20h10m13s,14d15m20s
parameters.name: extract-islands

parameters.info: Replace all island numbers with value of 1
parameters.name: make-binary

parameters.info: Apply dilation with a radius of R pixels
parameters.name: dilate

parameters.info: Fill holes (i.e. entirely closed regions) in mask
parameters.name: fill-holes

parameters.info: Suffix for mask image (default based on input name)
parameters.name: outfile
